headline.main: PARLEY TO CONSIDER PRODUCTION PROBLEMS; Management Group to Weigh the New Factors Now Involved

lead_paragraph: Production problems of democracy in war and peace will be discussed at the annual conference of the Society for the Advancement of Management, Thursday and Friday at the Hotel Commodore. The theme will be "A Revaluation of Management in the Light of the Present Crisis."
abstract: Soc for Advancement of Management holds U S can outproduce totalitarian systems

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: MANAGEMENT, SOC FOR THE ADVANCEMENT OF
